name: 王偉榕
intro: Received the B.S. degree and the M.S. degree in the Department of Computer Science from National Chiao Tung University, Hsinchu, Taiwan, in 1997 and 2002. He is currently a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University. His research interests include mobile computing, wireless Internet, and power management.
